thread.section_title: Wheelbasealloys Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wheelbasealloys | www.wheelbasealloys.com
thread.title: maurice kirkpatrick

author: maurice kirkpatrick
title: maurice kirkpatrick
text:
I recently ordered a set of alloys for my van, great customer service and delivery.
I wanted to be 100% sure the sizes and style would fit my van so I rang and spoke to the sales team who were extremely helpful, and then I placed my order online. After ordering they contacted me regarding delivery to keep me informed and just as promised a few days later the wheels arrived, and even more importantly they look fantastic on the van, at a great price as well, everyone's a winner.
